form6.title: Form 6
form6.fullDescription: Form 6 is used for fresh inclusion of name in the electoral roll. If you are a citizen of India, have attained the age of 18 years, and are an ordinary resident of a constituency, you can apply using this form.
eligibility: Indian citizen aged 18 years or above
Ordinary resident of the constituency where registration is sought
Not already registered in any other constituency
documentsRequired: Proof of age (Birth certificate, Marksheet, Aadhaar, Passport, etc.)
Proof of ordinary residence (Aadhaar, Utility bill, Bank passbook, Rent agreement)
steps: Visit the NVSP Portal or your nearest ERO office
Fill in Form 6 with your personal details
Upload your photograph and supporting documents
Submit the form online or in person
Your application will be verified by the BLO (Booth Level Officer)
Once approved, your name will appear in the electoral roll

form7.title: Form 7
form7.fullDescription: Form 7 is used for raising objection to a proposed inclusion or for requesting deletion of an existing name from the electoral roll. This is typically used when a voter has shifted, passed away, or been incorrectly included.
eligibility: Any person whose name is to be deleted due to death
Any person whose name is to be deleted due to permanent shift to another constituency
Any person who finds duplicate entries in the electoral roll
Any elector of the constituency can file objection to incorrect inclusion
documentsRequired: EPIC (Voter ID) number of the person whose name is to be deleted
Details of the duplicate entry (if applicable)
steps: Visit the NVSP Portal or your nearest ERO office
Fill in Form 7 with details of the person to be removed
Provide reason for deletion (death, shifted, duplicate, etc.)
The ERO will verify and process the request
The name will be removed after due verification

form8.title: Form 8
form8.fullDescription: Form 8 is used for correction or transposition of entries in the existing electoral roll. If your name, address, age, photo, or any other details are incorrect in your Voter ID, you can use this form to correct them.
eligibility: Any registered voter who needs to correct personal details
Voters who have shifted residence within the same constituency
Voters who need to replace a damaged or lost EPIC
Persons with Disabilities (PwD) who need to update their status
documentsRequired: Proof of correct details (for name/age correction)
New address proof (for address change within constituency)
steps: Visit the NVSP Portal or your nearest ERO office
Fill in Form 8 with the corrections needed
Select the type of correction (name, address, photo, etc.)
Upload supporting documents for the correction
BLO will verify the changes and update the electoral roll
